mapper.insert: insert into systemlog (opUser_id, opTime, opIp, function, params) values (#{opuserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{function,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, opUser_id, opTime, opIp, function, params from systemlog
